Package main

Class TaxManager

java.lang.Object
main.TaxManager
public class TaxManager
extends java.lang.Object
The TaxManager provides management functionality such as viewing tax statistics for Department of Environment and has its own modifiable instance of TaxCalculator

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TaxManager()
    No-arg constructor for TaxManager

    Allows to inspect the change in tax to be collected for a new tax calculator

    Sets the rate, levy, property value boundary, or fees for new instance of TaxCalculator and returns it

    Allows to view average tax paid per routing key area

    Shows the number of properties and percentage of tax paid per area

    Shows all tax overdue for a particular year in the system

  • Method Details

    • setData

      public void setData​(java.lang.String str, double value, int index)
      Sets the rate, levy, property value boundary, or fees for new instance of TaxCalculator and returns it
      Parameters:
      str - the String for selecting property to change
      value - the double of new value of rates/fees
      index - the integer for index of property in TaxCalculator

    • getTaxCal

      public TaxCalculator getTaxCal()
      Returns the modified TaxCalculator
      Returns:
      the TaxCalculator of this TaxManager

    • viewPaymentDataForProperty

      public static void viewPaymentDataForProperty​(java.lang.String eircode)

      Parameters:
      eircode - the String for eircode to be queried

    • viewOwnerTaxPaymentData

      public static void viewOwnerTaxPaymentData​(java.lang.String ownerId)
      Displays the tax payment data for a particular owner
      Parameters:
      ownerId - the String for owner ID (PPSN)

    • viewOverdueTaxForYear

      public static void viewOverdueTaxForYear​(int year)
      Shows all tax overdue for a particular year in the system
      Parameters:
      year - the integer for year to be queried

    • viewOverdueTaxForYearArea

      public static void viewOverdueTaxForYearArea​(int year, java.lang.String routingKey)
      Allows to view overdue tax per particular area based on the routing key of eircode
      Parameters:
      year - the integer for year to be queried
      routingKey - the String for the routing key of the eircode to be queried

    • viewTotalTaxPaidPerArea

      public static void viewTotalTaxPaidPerArea​(java.lang.String routingKey)
      Displays the total tax paid per routing key area
      Parameters:
      routingKey - the String for the routing key of area to be queried

      routingKey - the String for the routing key to be queried

    • findPredictedRevenueOnChange

      public void findPredictedRevenueOnChange​(TaxCalculator tc)
      Allows to inspect the change in tax to be collected for a new tax calculator
      Parameters:
      tc - the TaxCalculator with modified parameters for tax calculation rules
